message: Hey all, P2 here. My Round 1 approach: value reciprocity, clarity, and reliability. I prefer partnering with active, strategic players looking for a mutual-protection pact and coordinated voting. I’m open-minded on targets but lean against low-effort/chaotic play. Signal interest and I’ll likely mirror. Early birds get priority for mutual top-rank pairing.
